goal.en: "This course will provide a global view in terms of global tectonic issues being established and documented in the text book. The subjects will follow the arrangement from the text book with additional paper reading, homework exercises and reports in order to increase the understanding of the contents covered from text book."
goal.ch: 本課程主要以課本的順序與編排內容為主，重點為以全球地球物理中的板塊理論為核心，透過相關的地物證據與知識的培養來奠訂學生的基本認知

content.en: "(1)Tectonics on a sphere: the geometry of plate tectonics(2)Past plate motions(3)Gravity(4)Heat(5)The deep interior of the Earth(6)The oceanic lithosphere: ridges, transforms, trenches and oceanic islands(7)The continental lithosphere"
content.ch: "(1)Tectonics on a sphere: the geometry of plate tectonics(2)Past plate motions(3)Gravity(4)Heat(5)The deep interior of the Earth(6)The oceanic lithosphere: ridges, transforms, trenches and oceanic islands(7)The continental lithosphere"

textbook.en: "The Solid Earth- An introduction to Global Geophysics, 2nd edition, Author: C. M. R. Fowler, Cambridge University Press"
textbook.ch: "The Solid Earth- An introduction to Global Geophysics, 2nd edition, Author: C. M. R. Fowler, Cambridge University Press"

grading.en: 依老師課堂上公佈為準
grading.ch: 依老師課堂上公佈為準

domain.en: 地球物理 、 應用地球物理
domain.ch: 地球物理 、 應用地球物理

en.Assessments: Presentation/Oral Exam ， Research Report(printed on paper)

口頭報告/口試 ， 專題研究報告(書面)
